mapper.sql: account_Id, area_code, Lng, lat, shape, point, rlat, rlng
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from merchant_area
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into merchant_area (account_Id, area_code, Lng, lat, shape, point, rlat, rlng) values (#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into merchant_area
account_Id,
area_code,
Lng,
lat,
shape,
point,
rlat,
rlng,
#{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
mapper.update:
update merchant_area
account_Id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Lng = #{record.lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{record.lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shape = #{record.shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point = #{record.point,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rlat = #{record.rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rlng = #{record.rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update merchant_area set account_Id = #{record.accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, area_code = #{record.areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Lng = #{record.lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, lat = #{record.lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, shape = #{record.shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, point = #{record.point,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rlat = #{record.rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rlng = #{record.rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update merchant_area
Lng = #{lng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
shape = #{shape,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
point = #{point,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rlat = #{rlat,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
rlng = #{rlng,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where account_Id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and area_code = #{areaCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ma.area_code,(select ca.cname from code_area ca where ca.area_code=ma.area_code) area from merchant_area ma where ma.account_Id = #{accountId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.sql: ma.account_Id, ma.area_code, ma.Lng, ma.lat, ma.shape, ma.point, ma.rlat, ma.rlng
